t:
When the Big Pharma released their new love serum, it was a bestseller. Hundreds of people lined up in front of the pharmacies.

The next day a wise village doctor set up his shop with his latest creation. He had no customers, no lines â€” but he had lived long and had loved, lost, and learned.

He knew that it wouldn't be long before the people will be back for a serum
for letting go.
c:
Which serum are you looking for?



#love #lost #medicine #lettinggo #unaware #emotions #wise #experience
